title: Twitter plans to remove and archive inactive accounts
description: Chief executive Elon Musk said the move was important to make more Twitter usernames available.

title: Vietnam to crack down on anonymous social media accounts
description: It's the latest in a series of restrictions imposed by the Vietnamese government on social media users.

title: Tech layoffs: LinkedIn cuts 700 jobs and phases out China
description: The careers site is the latest tech company to announce major job cuts.
